channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain in Post Office lane needs further work as jetting team unable to clear outlet, 23rd April
item.description:
The drain by the Western Power sub station 50 metres on the left going down Post Office Lane from the top.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Post Office Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 23rd April
item.description:
email rec 15/04/2024 - There are two large trees outside my house. A large branch has fallen off one of the trees and gone through the windscreen of my daughterâ€™s car. There are other branches on the trees that look unsafe. Please can you address this as a matter of urgency. I await your response.
Report on FixMyStreet
